Verses: 1 oivunaalaana Pinbu Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum, Yaakkobin Thaayaagiya Mariyaalum, Salome Enbavalum, Avarukku Sugandhavarkkamidumpadi Avaigalai Vaangikkondu,
2 vaaraththin Mudhalaam Naal Adhigaalaiyile Sooriyan Udhayamaagirapodhu Kallaraiyinidaththil Vandhu,
3 kallaraiyin Vaasalirukkira Kallai Namakkaaga Evan Purattiththalluvaan Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondaargal.
4 andhakkal Migavum Peridhaayirundhadhu; Avargal Erittuppaarkkirapodhu, Adhu Thallappattirukkiradhaik Kandaargal.
5 avargal Kallaraikkul Piravesiththu, Vellaiyangi Thariththavanaai Valadhupakkaththil Utkaarndhirundha Oru Vaalibanaikkandu Bayandhaargal.
6 avan Avargalai Nokki: Bayappadaadhirungal, Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvaith Thedugireergal; Avar Uyirththezhundhaar, Avar Ingeyillai; Idho, Avarai Vaiththa Idam.

7 neengal Avarudaiya Seesharidaththirkum, Pedhuruvinidaththirkum Poi: Ungalukku Munne Galileyaavukkup Pogiraar, Avar Ungalukku Sonnapadiye Ange Avaraik Kaanbeergal Endru, Avargalukku Sollungal Endraan.
8 nadukkamum Thigilum Avargalaip Pidiththapadiyaal, Avargal Seekkiramaai Veliye Vandhu, Kallaraiyai Vittu Odinaargal; Avargal Bayandhirundhapadiyinaal Oruvarukkum Ondrum Sollaamarponaargal.
9 vaaraththin Mudhalaamnaal Adhigaalaiyile Yesu Ezhundhirundhapinbu, Magadhalenaa Mariyaalukku Mudhalmudhal Dharisanamaanaar.

10 avalidaththilirundhu Avar Ezhu Pisaasugalaith Thuraththiyirundhaar. Aval Purappattu, Avarode Kooda Irundhavargal Dhukkappattu Azhudhukondirukkaiyil, Avargalidaththil Poi, Andha Seydhiyai Ariviththaal.
11 avar Uyirodirukkiraar Endrum Avalukkuk Kaanappattaar Endrum Avargal Kettapozhudhu Nambavillai.
12 adhanpinbu Avargalil Iranduper Oru Giraamaththukku Nadandhupogirapozhudhu Avargalukku Maruroobamaaith Dharisanamaanaar.
13  Avargalum Poi, Adhai Matravargalukku Ariviththaargal; Avargalaiyum Avargal Nambavillai.

14 adhanpinbu Padhinoruvarum Pojanapandhiyirukkaiyil Avargalukku Avar Dharisanamaagi, Uyirththezhundhirundha Thammaik Kandavargalai Avargal Nambaamarponadhinimiththam Avargaludaiya Avisuvaasaththaikkuriththum Irudhaya Kadinaththaikkuriththum, Avargalaik Kadindhukondaar.
15 pinbu, Avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ulagamengum Poi, Sarva Sirushtikkum Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiyungal.
16  Visuvaasamullavanaagi Gnaanasnaanam Petravan Ratchikkappaduvaan; Visuvaasiyaadhavano Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkappaduvaan.
17 visuvaasikkiravargalaal Nadakkum Adaiyaalangalaavana: En Naamaththinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththuvaargal. Navamaana Baashaigalaip Pesuvaargal;
18 sarppangalai Eduppaargal; Saavukkedhuvaana Yaadhondraikkudiththaalum Adhu Avargalai Sedhappaduththaadhu; Viyaadhiyasthar Mel Kaigalai Vaippaargal, Appozhudhu Avargal Sosthamaavaargal Endraar.
19 ivvidhamaaik Karththar Avargaludane Pesinapinbu, Paralogaththukku Eduththukkollappattu, Dhevanudaiya Valadhu Paarisaththil Utkaarndhaar.
20 avargal Purappattuppoi, Engum Pirasangampanninaargal. Karththar Avargaludanekoodak Kiriyaiyai Nadappiththu, Avargalaal Nadandha Adaiyaalangalinaale Vasanaththai Urudhippaduththinaar. Aamen.
